Class TicTacToe

  • java.lang.Object
    • TicTacToe

  • public class TicTacToe
extends java.lang.Object
    TicTacToe runs a game of TicTacToe. The class TicTacToe contains game logic needed for variable sized game of tic-tac-toe.
    Version:
    2018.1214
    Author:
    Arttu Knuutinen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static TicTacToeNode[][] board
      Game board in 2-dimensional array.

      Board height, chosen by user.
      private static int boardWidth
      Board width, chosen by user.
      private static boolean gameOver
      Boolean that keeps track of gamestate.
      private static int inRowToWin
      Marks needed in a row to win the game, chosen by user.
      private static TicTacToeNode lastUsedNode
      Keeps track of the most recently played position.
      private static int maxReasonableSize
      Maximum reasonable board size.
      private static int minBoardSize
      Minimum board size.
      private static boolean playerTurn
      Boolean that decides if it is the player's or the computer's turn.
      private static java.util.Scanner sc
      Scanner to take user input.
      private static int turnsTaken
      Counts the turns taken, used to check if game ends in a draw.

      • playerTurn

        private static void playerTurn()
        Handles the player's turn.

      • aiTurn

        private static void aiTurn()
        Handles the computer's turn. Tries to play its move somewhere around the player's last position. If there are no empty nodes around the position, plays on a random node.

      • endGame

        private static void endGame()
        Reports the game result.

      • getUserInputInt

        private static int getUserInputInt(java.lang.String input)
        Returns parsed integer from user input string.
        Parameters:
        input - String from user.
        Returns:
        -1 if user didn't give valid input.

        Prints board coordinate numbers for X - axis.

        Prints a line of ascii graphic for the board.
        Parameters:

        Prints the game board.

      • wasWinningMove

        private static boolean wasWinningMove(TicTacToeNode node)
        Determines if the node forms a winning combination.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to check for victory.
        Returns:
        true if node forms a combination of required length.

      • isBetween

        private static boolean isBetween(int x,
                                 int min,
                                 int max)
        Checks if x is between min and max.
        Parameters:
        x - value to test.
        min - the low value.
        max - the high value.
        Returns:
        true if value of x is between min and max

      • getUserConfirmation

        private static boolean getUserConfirmation()
        Asks user to confirm a decision.
        Returns:
        true if user input starts with 'y'
